email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Hope you're doing well. I have a client looking to move 100,000 MT of crude oil from Ras Tanura to Rotterdam. The laycan is 15-20 October. Could you provide a freight quote for this? Let me know if you need any additional details.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for reaching out. For this route, we can offer a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per MT. The vessel we have in mind is the MV Ocean Star, a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. Let me know if this works for your client.

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for the quick response. My client is considering the offer but is hoping for a rate closer to $49.50 per MT. Also, could you confirm the laycan and any demurrage terms?

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I understand your client's position. We can adjust the rate to $50.00 per MT, but that's our best offer. The laycan remains 15-20 October, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for the flexibility. My client has agreed to the $50.00 per MT rate. Please confirm the vessel details and laycan, and we can proceed with the fixture.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Great news! The MV Ocean Star is confirmed for the laycan 15-20 October. I'll send over the fixture recap shortly. Thanks for your cooperation.

Cheers,
John
